 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְחֹרָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==merchandise==; — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחֹרַת‎</span> [[Ezek.27.15|Ezek 27:15]], but see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סחר‎</span> ***Participle*** 

<small>Also see: **<big>[[H8210|שָׁפַךְ]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַק‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂפַק‎</span>], **verb** ==slap, clap== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slap*** (face), ***strike*** (hands) [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1373</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָפַק‎</span> consecutive [[Jer.48.26|Jer 48:26]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפָקָם‎</span> [[Job.34.26|Job 34:26]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַ֫קְתִּי‎</span> [[Jer.31.19|Jer 31:19]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָֽפְקוּ‎</span> [[Lam.2.15|Lam 2:15]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂפֹּק‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> substantive for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span>) [[Job.27.23|Job 27:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְפּוֺק‎</span> [[Job.34.37|Job 34:37]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּסְפֹּק‎</span> [[Num.24.10|Num 24:10]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפֹק‎</span> [[Ezek.21.17|Ezek 21:17]] — 

**1.** ***slap***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליָֿרֵךְ‎</span> ***on the thigh***, in remorse and sorrow [[Jer.31.19|Jer 31:19]]; [[Ezek.21.17|Ezek 21:17]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפַּיִם‎</span> ***clap*** one's ***hands*** [[Num.24.10|Num 24:10]] (in anger), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***at***, [[Lam.2.15|Lam 2:15]]; [[Job.27.23|Job 27:23]] (in mockery); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> omitted [[Job.34.37|Job 34:37]] (in presumptuousness, against God). 

**2.*****slap, chastise***, with accusative of person [[Job.34.26|Job 34:26]] (subject God). 

**3.** ***splash*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺאָב בְּקִיאוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְס‎</span> [[Jer.48.26|Jer 48:26]] ***and Moab shall splash*** (fall with a splash) ***into his vomit***, &gt; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup> ***empty himself (?), throw up*** (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבְיַלְרֵי נָכְרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׂפִּ֫יקוּ‎</span> [[Isa.2.6|Isa 2:6]] (read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבִידֵי‎</span> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]], ***and into the hands of foreigners they clap***, literally ***cause to clap***, that is, their hands; &gt; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] from 1. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂפק‎</span> q. v., ***they abound in, have a sufficiency of).***
